sentences.english: The exhibition of folk customs includes an attractive display of local foods.
sentences.chinese: 家乡风味食品在这届民俗民风展览会上引众人注目。

sentences.english: Inom not used to driving cars with their steering wheels inside the right.
sentences.chinese: 我不民风于驾驶方向盘在左边的汽车。

sentences.english: To rectify the Party's style of work and improve social conduct, we should start with the senior cadres.
sentences.chinese: 为了整顿党风，搞好民风，先要从我们高级干部整起。

sentences.english: It is full of breath-taking landscape, ancient history, simple folkway , wonderful culture.
sentences.chinese: 可谓是风景秀丽，历史古老，民风淳朴，文化灿烂。

sentences.english: My dear friends, You must be inspired by the beautiful scenes and the natural folkway in Daocheng county.
sentences.chinese: 您一定被稻城美丽的风光和纯朴的民风所感染了。

sentences.english: Folkway is a general topic in all kinds of local chronicles.
sentences.chinese: 民风是各类地方志都会涉及到的普遍话题。

sentences.english: Shangrao had nice scenery with hills and waters and unaffected folk customs.
sentences.chinese: 上饶有美丽的山水与纯朴的民风民俗。

sentences.english: As knowledge spread about the dangers of smoking, customs changed.
sentences.chinese: 随着吸烟有害健康的知识普及，民风为之一变。

sentences.english: Hakka people are very passinate and their folkway is honest.
sentences.chinese: 客家人非常好客，民风纯朴。

sentences.english: Here folkway is simple, and has the name of xanadu.
sentences.chinese: 这里民风淳朴，有“世外桃源”之称。

sentences.english: You must be inspired by the beautiful scenes and the natural folkway in Daocheng county.
sentences.chinese: 您一定被稻城美丽的风光和纯朴的民风所感染了。

sentences.english: Yaoli is surely a place of honesty and plain living.
sentences.chinese: 瑶里果然是一个民风纯朴的地方。

sentences.english: Mum said it is the local folkway and habitude .
sentences.chinese: 妈妈说，这是这里的民风。

sentences.english: In Xitang, people are simple and unsophisticated , market is very prosperous and scene will change at every step.
sentences.chinese: 西塘民风醇厚，市场繁华，清逸秀丽，移步换景。

sentences.english: Here are quaint shops lining folk customs.
sentences.chinese: 这里铺衬的都是古朴的民风。

sentences.english: The evolvement of folk door spirit had direct connection to the imperial advocation.
sentences.chinese: 民间门神的演变与皇家对民风的倡导有着直接的关系。

definition: to promote a martial spirit/to revere military skills/warlike
variant of 淳樸|淳朴[chun2 pu3]
circumstances of the people/popular sentiment/the mood of the people/popular customs
common term for non-Han peoples in former times, not exclusively derogatory/barbarian
lit. no one picks up lost articles in the street (idiom)/fig. honesty prevails throughout society
tradition or style from the past/old ways/surviving tradition/relic
cohabitation (of different populations or races)/to coexist
lit. doors not locked at night (idiom); fig. stable society
